original_title: SOD女子社員 技術部入社1年目 カメラアシスタント「小池さら」AV出演（デビュー）！！
overview: The second installment of Koike Sara, who has been in the company for the first year. The previous work that shot her amateur SEX without permission and made it into an AV. In order to respond to the feedback and favorable opinions of everyone who saw it, this time we titled "Koike Sara AV Appearance Project" and imposed AV training as a business for a full-scale debut. Please take a look at Koike, who has grown from the last time and is still ashamed of Ubu!
title: SOD Female Employee. Engineering Department. A Camera Assistant In Her First Year With The Company. "Sara Koike" Porn Appearance (Debut)!!
